name: Craveyard
description:
A game made in less than 12 hours for XIII_XXV on Reddit.

Craveyard is the latest in the graveyard pizza delivery simulation survival horror genre.

Your goal is to deliver your pizza to Ken Bonez as quick as you can while dodging a pizza stealing ghost.

Featuring:

  • Randomly Generated Graveyard
  • Ken Bonez
  • Spoopy Atmosphere
  • High Score

Assets used in this game

  • Cemetery (BitGem)
  • Car (Unity Asset Store)
  • Ghost (Bart)
  • Sounds (Kenney)

Update 1:

  • Added a second faster ghost in hard mode.
  • Added a game over screen with spooky noises.
